generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with lane markings and traffic lights, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area next to the road with a curb, where a person is standing, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: A multi-story structure is visible in the background on the right side of the image.
- fence: A metal fence is visible on the left side of the image, running along the sidewalk.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead.
- traffic sign: A yellow sign with the number "94" is visible on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background and along the sides of the road.
- terrain: Grass and dirt areas are visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- sky: The dark blue sky is visible above the buildings and trees.
- person: A person is standing on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- car: A car is visible in front of the camera, stopped at the traffic light.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible on the right side of the road, further down the street.
